Name: The Adventures of LinShanHai - Chapter2:Bus Bombing
About the game: Chapter2:Bus Bombing Case Description: The bus to the suburbs suddenly exploded, the scene was a mess, the sales staff, including all 10 people on board died. Lin Shanhai led the scene investigation team to conduct a detailed investigation and visited all the families and friends of the deceased, but the case is still clueless. He decided to restore the real situation in the car before the crime for deductive reasoning. Everything is locked in the most critical 10 minutes You will be in this tense critical 10-minute round Use deductive reasoning to solve this bombing case Puzzle, deduce, and don't let go of every detail. Get the truth and bring the killer to justice! Gameplay: Players first need to search for clues at the crime scene, and then reason and merge clues in the brain map to finally arrive at the truth. You can follow the hints of the clue radar to find the physical evidence, and use the clue analyzer to assist in reasoning when you encounter clues that you can't get.
